p: The fresh leaves of P. orientalis were cut into small pieces and subjected to hydrodistillation using Clevenger-type apparatus (Model: British Pharmacopoeia, manufactured by Pyrexfan Company, Iran and mantle model EM manufactured by Bibby Scientific Company, United Kingdom). The essential oil was dried over anhydrous sodium sulfate and the purified oil transferred into amber-colored vials at +4 Â°C until further use.
